Articles.Content: I just bought ksp and the two  dlcs today , and all hapened succesfuly at the begining . But after paying , I got to a link that wouldnt open (chrome says error too many redirections) . So i closed it . I can't see the purchase in your orders so i can't install it . The confirmation email and the bank biling has been received . Does it just take time to process the order or it has an real error ?
